John,

I recently started a podcast where I interview successful software professionals and find stories and ideas about programming and life in software.

I’d really love to feature you as a guest on the show and hear your perspective and share your story. If you’d be interested in spending 45 minutes or so with me, I think we’d have a result that would benefit my listeners and hopefully be rewarding for you as well.

The site for the show is here: http://developeronfire.com/

Here is my blog post describing what I am trying to do with the podcast: http://optimizedprogrammer.com/blog/my-podcast-is-live

Please let me know if you think this is something you’d find worthwhile and would be willing to talk with me.
